title: Hour 1 - Chris Simms (06-25-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chris Simms (06-25-20)
description:
Chris Simms tells Dan that the NFL is in a tough time and he is not optimistic right now that the season will start on time. Chris says in his heart of hearts he doesn't believe that the season will start on time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
